s: Nicole D’Andria is a freelance writer and editor specializing in the comic book industry. She currently freelances for Tapas Media, Scout Comics, and J-Novel. She also adapted the television show Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug and Cat Noir as well as Peter David’s novel Artful to comics.

Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– ) - IMDb
s: December 20, 2015 - Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir: With Cristina Valenzuela, Bryce Papenbrook, Max Mittelman, Mela Lee. Marinette and Adrien, two normal teens, transform into the superheroes Ladybug and Cat Noir when a mysterious evil threatens to destroy Paris.
